Data Science

different industries. E.g.

Supervised learning

Linear & Logistic regression

KNN method
Neural Networks & Deep learning

We solve variety of unsupervised learning problems. E.g.
Clustering
Association mining
Segmentation
Dimensionality reduction
Natural Language processing
Face recognition etc
Reinforcement learning
We have experience in creating recommendation system for variety of business problems
